name: Natural Basketball Free
description:
Natural Basketball is a game of basketball with an innovative and intuitive gameplay. You can throw the ball freely, in a much more natural way, better adapted to the touch interface.
The full version game features five different themes for the matches and the user can also choose from eight different balls, each with individual characteristics that can better adapt to the style of each player.
Natural Basketball has a series of achievements that can increase the score, when unlocked.
Play and share your achievements with your friends via Facebook or Twitter.
What are you waiting for? Download Natural Basketball, join us and play!

Feratures
- 5 themes (Full Version)
- 8 different balls, with individual characteristics (Full Version)
- Graphics created for retina display
- Original sound track
- Possibility of sharing achievements on Facebook and Twitter
- Game Center leaderboards: highest total score and highest score in one match (Full Version)
- Game Center achievements (Full Version)
- You can play your favorite music in background, while playing (using iPod native IOS app)
- Hours of fun!
